participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is reflective and thoughtful, often finding solace in history and creative expression.
participant_1.background: I remember the warmth of the other orphans when we huddled together for warmth at night. I am a civil war reenactment participant. So I started a small business. I live alone with my dog. I have a baby mobile that plays the Lumineers' songs.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and curious, always eager to explore new ideas and express himself through art.
participant_2.background: I like to go on walks with my dog, because he's always excited to explore. My favorite type of music is country. I like doing art projects. I enjoy this type of activist work, as my job isn’t very personally fulfilling. I spend a lot of time reading and researching weird and wonderful things.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing alright, thanks! I'm a civil war reenactment participant.
That's really cool! I've always thought that was a really interesting hobby. Do you have a favorite reenactment that you've done?
I think my favorite one was the Battle of Gettysburg. It was so intense and immersive, and it really gave me a sense of what it must have been like to fight in the Civil War.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure it was a really moving experience.
It was. I'm glad I got to be a part of it.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to go on walks with my dog, and I like to do art projects. I also enjoy reading and researching weird and wonderful things.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do art projects too, and I love reading.
What kind of art do you like to do?
I like to paint, draw, and make jewelry.
That's cool! I like to paint and draw too.
What's your favorite thing to paint or draw?
I like to paint landscapes, and I like to draw animals.
Those are both great subjects! I love painting landscapes too.
Me too! They're so peaceful and relaxing.
